mapper.sql: SELECT /* stBwInfo.getBadWordList */ BW_SEQ , BW_NM , BW_DESC , USE_YN , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ST_BW_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND BW_NM LIKE #{bwNm} || '%' AND USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' ORDER BY BW_SEQ DESC
